docna.cdata!:
Nicaragua - Municipal Development Project :
            Loan 2086 - JRM Project Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Nicaragua - Municipal Development
            Project : Loan 2086 - JRM Project Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would: (a) assist
            the Managua Municipal Reconstruction Board to upgrade and
            protect from flood and storm damage the basic transport
            infrastructure in 26 low-income neighborhoods in the city of
            Managua; (b) assist the Secretariat of Municipal Affairs to
            implement a parallel pilot program, including protection of
            basic transport infrastructure in 15 municipalities in the
            country's main areas of production; and (c) provide
            technical assistance to strengthen the effectiveness,
            institutional framework, and management capacity of JRM and SAMU.
